sentences.sentence: The calcareous white stones of the river Piave constitute this land.
sentences.translation: 皮亚韦河钙质的白色石头构成了这片土地。

sentences.sentence: Corals having calcareous skeletons aggregations of which form reefs and islands.
sentences.translation: 钙质骨骼聚合的珊瑚，能形成礁石和岛屿。

sentences.sentence: Protected surfaces can build up a layer of off white calcareous deposit which will be difficult to remove.
sentences.translation: 受保护的表面能够形成一层灰白色的钙质沉着，这是很难去掉的。
